ComicInfo.Title: Part 1: Quest for the Treasure of Stimuli
ComicInfo.Summary: From a far away land rises a mighty hero. The son of peasants from two different realms, the one known only as Barak protects the people of Hope Kingdom at all costs. Watch as he takes on the likes of Boosh the Dim, Red Sarah, and Cha-nee the Grim in this spectacular first issue! The story takes place in our time but is told by the perspective of people in the future. The people in the future viewed us primitives riding around on dinosaur bones. In thins issue Barack the hero battles Old Warrior (John McCain) and Red Sarah (Sarah Palin). All the while being watched by Boosh the Dim (George Bush) and Cha-nee the Grim (Dick Chaney). BY the end of the issue he meets Hilaria (Hilary Clinton).
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-18 18:53:08. [CVDB161515]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Christopher Schons, Joel Humberto Herrera, Rachelle Rosenberg, Tim Seeley
ComicInfo.Characters: Barack the Barbarian, Boosh, Cha-nee, Harry Burden, Hilaria, Manny the Fixer, Old Warrior, Red Sarah
